name: Sodium
description: Modern rendering engine and client-side optimization mod for Minecraft.

name: Lithium
description: No-compromises game logic/server optimization mod.

name: Mod Menu
description: Adds a mod menu to view the list of mods you have installed.

name: ReplayMod
description: A Minecraft Mod to record, relive and share your experience.

name: Capes
description: Lets you use capes from OptiFine, LabyMod and other cape mods.

name: Dynamic FPS
description: Improve performance when Minecraft is in the background.

name: Iris
description: A modern shaders mod for Minecraft intended to be compatible with existing OptiFine shader packs.

name: Enhanced Block Entities
description: Reduce FPS lag with block entities, as well as customize them with resource packs.

name: No Chat Reports
description: Makes chat unreportable (where possible).

name: AdvancementInfo
description: Show more information about advancement requirements.

name: Animatica
description: A mod implementing the OptiFine/MCPatcher animated texture format.

name: AntiGhost
description: Get rid of ghost blocks by requesting resends from the server.

name: Auditory
description: A mod that expands and improves upon the sound and audio aspects of Minecraft.

name: Auto Crouch
description: Automatically crouches when opening a GUI.

name: Better Mount HUD
description: Improves the ingame HUD while riding a mount.

name: CIT Resewn
description: Re-implements MCPatcher's CIT (custom item textures from optifine resource packs).

name: Colormatic
description: Enables resource packs to add and change block and biome colors.

name: Continuity
description: A Fabric mod that allows for efficient connected textures.

name: CrashBrander
description: Small mod which adds your (modpack) branding to crash reports, useful for debugging.

name: Cull Less Leaves
description: Cull leaves while looking hot.

name: Custom Entity Models
description: Custom Entity Models suport on Fabric.

name: Debugify
description: Fixes Minecraft bugs found on the bug tracker.

name: Disable Insecure Chat Toast
description: This mod deletes warning toast about connecting to a server without enforce secure chat.

name: Draggable Resource Packs
description: Makes resource packs draggable instead of needing to click buttons.

name: EasierVillagerTrading
description: Fewer clicks to trade with villagers.

name: Entity Texture Features
description: Emissive, Random & Custom texture support for entities in resourcepacks just like Optifine but for Fabric.

name: EntityCulling
description: Using async path-tracing to hide Block-/Entities that are not visible.

name: Fabrishot
description: Take insanely large screenshots because why not.

name: FerriteCore
description: Memory usage optimizations.

name: Gamma Utils
description: Gamma / brightness / night vision mod, making it easy to see in the dark. Basically fullbright for Fabric.

name: Item Model Fix
description: A Fabric mod that fixes gaps in generated item models.

name: LambdaBetterGrass
description: A Minecraft mod which adds better grass and snow to the game.

name: LambDynamicLights
description: A dynamic lights mod for Fabric.

name: Language Reload
description: Reduces load times and adds fallbacks for languages.

name: LazyDFU
description: Makes the game boot faster by deferring non-essential initialization.

name: Litematica
description: Litematica is a new schematic mod written from scratch, and it is primarily targeting light mod loaders like LiteLoader on 1.12.x, Rift on 1.13.x and Fabric on 1.14+.

name: Main Menu Credits
description: Adds a way of adding information to the user's title screen.

name: MidnightControls
description: Adds controller support and enhanced controls overall.

name: Mixin Conflict Helper
description: User-friendly errors for Mixin conflicts.

name: More Culling
description: A mod that changes how multiple types of culling are handled in order to improve performance.

name: MoreChatHistory
description: Increases the maximum length of chat history.

name: Ngrok LAN
description: Share your singleplayer world as a server for you and your friends across the globe, in one click.

name: No Fade
description: Remove fade out animations in Minecraft.

name: Not Enough Crashes
description: When crashing, you can go back to the title screen and keep playing, without needing to restart, alongside other things to make crashes more pleasant.

name: OptiGUI
description: A drop-in replacement for OptiFine custom GUIs.

name: Pick Block Pro
description: An advanced client side Block, Entity, NBT, Tool and ID picker (Fabric).

name: Puzzle
description: Adds resourcepack features and a GUI to more conveniently configure OptiFine alternatives.

name: ShulkerBoxTooltip
description: View the contents of shulker boxes from your inventory.

name: Smooth Boot
description: Improve Minecraft CPU scheduling.

name: Starlight
description: Rewrites the light engine to fix lighting performance and lighting errors.

name: Status Effect Timer
description: Overlay a timer on the Vanilla status effect HUD icons.

name: ToolTipFix
description: Fixes Tooltips from runnning off the screen.

name: YOSBR
description: Your options shall be respected.

name: Zoomify
description: A zoom mod with infinite customizability.
